casebody.data:
Second Department,

January, 1984

(January 3, 1984) Mary R. Aitchison et al., Respondents, v Town of Mamaroneck et al., Defendants, and Funmar Construction Corp., Appellant.

Order of the Supreme Court, Westchester County (Isseks, J.), dated April 11, 1983, affirmed, with costs (see Rios v Wilcox Constr. Corp., 90 AD2d 826). Titone, J. P., Lazer, Mangano and Thompson, JJ., concur.
